channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Battle over Bison in Montana Sets a Dangerous Precedent
item.description: The Trump administration just undermined property rights — and ranchers should be worried.

item.title: Mamdani Has Learned Nothing from Rent-Control History
item.description: By embracing rent control, New York City’s mayor is recycling a policy that feels compassionate but fails everyone it touches.

item.title: Here Are 10 Great Justice Alito Quotes To Mark His 20 Years On The Supreme Court

item.title: The Problem with Trump’s Fraud-Prosecutor Plan
item.description: The credibility of federal law enforcement depends on its not being politicized.
